column5: For those of you that haven't made your trip up north yet I hope this helps get you a little closer to being ready.... about 15 minutes closer. I only have about 100 more clips to go through (3 days worth) Jimi and Pat (PJ) have fun on Lac Seul & Eagle. PJ make sure you bring some tobacco for spirit rock. lolhttps://youtu.be/NASJ07hGT2g
Nice Job, Brain !! You are TEASING Me !! lol! I wish I coulda brought My Boat up there.. maybe.. someday. AFTER, I learn the lake a bit... maybe... 5 more days till takeoff !! 7 to the HB !!!
cool video i hunt and fish there. like the zig zag part. sen bay is good fishing that time year
What kind of landing net was that? I think I want one if it's sturdy.
Thanks Mark. The Z is a cool place. You can really open it up through there. I sped the video up to 200% because I really wanted to see what 180 mph looked like through the zig zag! lol!

Its a frabill hyber-net. It is very sturdy. I like it for the fact that it stows nicely away but the net is a string (not rubber) type and if you have barbed hooks.... LOOK OUT.... if a hook goes through one of the knots in the net. Plan on a few minutes of curse words while everyone else is still fishing.
